html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12982024-12-09HC
ActPest Control Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Sodium Hypochlorite and Calcium Hypochlorite)
PrecisRegulations amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (SODIUM HYPOCHLORITE AND CALCIUM HYPOCHLORITE) in order to (1) update the label for sodium hypochlorite products from “Warning-Corrosive” to “Danger-Corrosive to eyes and skin” and change the shape around the precautionary symbol from a diamond to an octagon; and (2) update the label for calcium hypochlorite products from “Caution-Corrosive” to “Danger-Corrosive to eyes and skin” and change the shape around the precautionary symbol from a triangle to an octagon.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0259 Publication Date: 2024-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (SODIUM HYPOCHLORITE AND CALCIUM HYPOCHLORITE) in order to (1) update the label for sodium hypochlorite products from “Warning-Corrosive” to “Danger-Corrosive to eyes and skin” and change the shape around the precautionary symbol from a diamond to an octagon; and (2) update the label for calcium hypochlorite products from “Caution-Corrosive” to “Danger-Corrosive to eyes and skin” and change the shape around the precautionary symbol from a triangle to an octagon.
